title: droidboy 3000 Zooper
summary: Pipboy3000 & 4000 on your phone or watch read the description for watch setup
description: This is not a stand alone watch face! if you have any issues read description DROIDBOY3000 IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ROUND WATCHES PIPBOY4000 ISRequirements for Phone:1)Android Phone2) Zooper Widget Pro.Requirements for Watch1)Android Smart Watch2) Zooper Widget Pro3) Wearable WidgetsWelcome to Droidboy 3000 Zooper for Android Phones and Watches. This is one design for both phone and watches. Droidboy 3000 is inspired by the Fallout Pipboy 3000 giving you useful at a glance:Missed Phone, Sms, Email, Battery, Date, Weather Conditions, Temperature, Time, and shortcut to Google.If you want to save a bit more battery switch background and battery saver background in the layers settingsHow To Setup On Phone:1) Download the app 2) Create A New Widget 3) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3 4) Select The Widget You Want To Use5) Enjoy How To Setup On Watch:1) Download the app 2) Open Wearable Widgets3) Create A New Widget 4) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3 5) Select The Widget You Want To Use6) EnjoyI HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIX EVERY ISSUE JUST EMAIL ME Setting up for Square Watches1.Watch2.Zooper widget pro3. Wearable Widgets4.Open Wearable Widgets5. Select Zooper Widget and Apply Droidboy6. Done! Setting up for Round Watches 1.Watch2.Zooper widget pro3. Wearable Widgets4.Open Wearable Widgets5. Select Zooper Widget and Apply Droidboy6. Open Wearable settings and select crop widgets7.Select round screen sizing.8.Under screen type select fit widget outside of screen9.Done.
descriptionHTML:
This is not a stand alone watch face! if you have any issues read description DROIDBOY3000 IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ROUND WATCHES PIPBOY4000 IS

Requirements for Phone:
1)Android Phone
2) Zooper Widget Pro.

Requirements for Watch
1)Android Smart Watch
2) Zooper Widget Pro
3) Wearable Widgets

Welcome to Droidboy 3000 Zooper for Android Phones and Watches. This is one design for both phone and watches. Droidboy 3000 is inspired by the Fallout Pipboy 3000 giving you useful at a glance:Missed Phone, Sms, Email, Battery, Date, Weather Conditions, Temperature, Time, and shortcut to Google.

If you want to save a bit more battery switch background and battery saver background in the layers settings

How To Setup On Phone:
1) Download the app
2) Create A New Widget
3) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3
4) Select The Widget You Want To Use
5) Enjoy

How To Setup On Watch:
1) Download the app
2) Open Wearable Widgets
3) Create A New Widget
4) Scroll Down to Zooper Widget and Select Grid Size 4X3
5) Select The Widget You Want To Use
6) Enjoy


I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIX EVERY ISSUE JUST EMAIL ME

Setting up for Square Watches
1.Watch
2.Zooper widget pro
3. Wearable Widgets
4.Open Wearable Widgets
5. Select Zooper Widget and Apply Droidboy
6. Done!

Setting up for Round Watches
1.Watch
2.Zooper widget pro
3. Wearable Widgets
4.Open Wearable Widgets
5. Select Zooper Widget and Apply Droidboy
6. Open Wearable settings and select crop widgets
7.Select round screen sizing.
8.Under screen type select fit widget outside of screen
9.Done.
comments: I can't find the widget on zooper:/
Fantastic! Looks just like the pipboy 3000 and its on my watch!
Just a ZooperPro template It's not good. You're better off making one on your own.
recentChanges: added a new Pipboy! this new pipboy is compatible with phone square watches and round watches!
